title: 如何用命令方块做出一个加血加防御的钻石套？
author: Soumwer236
txt_content:
小弟最近在做一个闯关的单人游戏，需要用到以下的装备，
钻石套：保护8，耐久10，反弹3，加10生命值.
钻石剑：锋利15，耐久10，火焰附加3，击退5，抢夺3，加15生命值
弓：力量15，耐久10，火石2，击退5，抢夺3，加15生命值
哪位会命令方块的大神教教我.

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:diamond_helmet 1 0 {ench:[{id:0,lvl:8},{id:7,lvl:3},{id:34,lvl:10}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:861945397,UUIDMost:861945397,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码/give @p minecraft:diamond_chestplate 1 0 {ench:[{id:0,lvl:8},{id:7,lvl:3},{id:34,lvl:10}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:327226901,UUIDMost:327226901,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码/give @p minecraft:diamond_leggings 1 0 {ench:[{id:0,lvl:8},{id:7,lvl:3},{id:34,lvl:10}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:786681059,UUIDMost:786681059,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码/give @p minecraft:diamond_boots 1 0 {ench:[{id:0,lvl:8},{id:7,lvl:3},{id:34,lvl:10}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:145148216,UUIDMost:145148216,Amount:10,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {ench:[{id:16,lvl:15},{id:19,lvl:5},{id:20,lvl:3},{id:21,lvl:3},{id:34,lvl:10}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:188723725,UUIDMost:188723725,Amount:15,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码/give @p minecraft:bow 1 0 {ench:[{id:19,lvl:5},{id:21,lvl:3},{id:34,lvl:10},{id:48,lvl:15},{id:50,lvl:2}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:693184329,UUIDMost:693184329,Amount:15,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码
